author: Justin McCarthy
title: Lockdown exit - Austria and Denmark take first steps
description: Much focus will be on Austria and Denmark in the next couple of weeks as they begin to ease coronavirus restrictions, writes Justin McCarthy.
content:
There is a play by the French playwright Jean-Paul Sartre called 'No Exit'.
It depicts the afterlife in which three characters are punished by being locked in a room together for all eternity with no way out and is the source of the famous quote "hell is oth… [+7289 chars]
